CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 18, 1949, pg. 2 reads: "Flag Day Event - Unit 23 of A. Leo Weil School presented a special Flag Day program, "Making the Flag," at the school Tuesday. The play was directed by Mrs. Marguerite Strommen, Mrs. Alphretta Calloway and Mrs. Ernestine Parks.  Nearly a thousand students witnessed the ceremony. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Students standing on stage holding international flags, including girl wearing light colored hat and dress with bell sleeves, in A. Leo Weil school during Flag Day program "Making the Flag"
